darkMode.name: Dark Mode
darkMode.hint: Use a dark theme for the Spotlight Omnisearch

showImages.name: Show Images
showImages.hint: Display images in search results. Images will increase loading times for the results and may result in stuttering depending on the number of results and the size of the images.

searchSettings.name: Search Settings
searchSettings.hint: Include game settings in search results

help.name: Help
list: Shift + Space to open the Spotlight Omnisearch
Escape or Click outside to close the Spotlight Omnisearch
Press Enter to confirm first result
Shift / Alt + Enter to execute the first or second actions of the first result
! to filter search results by type (!item, !actor)
Special commands: help, note, roll, or type a Math expression to calculate
